languages.text: "Я слышу, к чему ты клонишь, и мне не нравятся твои подозрения. Предупреждаю — если ты желаешь наречь благодать Неумирающего грехом псайкерства, ты ответишь за это кровью".
"I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."
languages.original_text: "Я слышу, к чему ты клонишь, и мне не нравятся твои подозрения. Предупреждаю — если ты желаешь наречь благодать Неумирающего грехом псайкерства, ты ответишь за это кровью".

"I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."

languages.text: «Entiendo bien la pregunta y no me gusta lo que insinúa. Le advierto que si pretende atribuir la bendición del Inmortal a alguna aberración psíquica, pagará esa afrenta con sangre».
languages.original_text: "I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo bien la pregunta y no me gusta lo que insinúa. Le advierto que si pretende atribuir la bendición del Inmortal a alguna aberración psíquica, pagará esa afrenta con sangre».

languages.text: 「言いたいことは分かるが、お前の陰口は気に入らない。警告しておくが、不死の者の加護を汚らわしい異能者と決めつけるような真似をすれば、血が流れることになる」
languages.original_text: "I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."

traits.locale_text: 「言いたいことは分かるが、お前の陰口は気に入らない。警告しておくが、不死の者の加護を汚らわしい異能者と決めつけるような真似をすれば、血が流れることになる」

languages.text: “我明白你的意思，我不喜欢你这种含沙射影的问话方式。我要警告你，如果你打算把不死之神的祝福污蔑成邪恶的异端灵能，我必将让你付出鲜血的代价。”
languages.original_text: "I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."

traits.locale_text: “我明白你的意思，我不喜欢你这种含沙射影的问话方式。我要警告你，如果你打算把不死之神的祝福污蔑成邪恶的异端灵能，我必将让你付出鲜血的代价。”

languages.text: "Ich höre, was Ihr sagt und mir gefallen Eure Andeutungen nicht. Ich warne Euch, falls Ihr versucht, den Segen des Todlosen als bloßen Psionismus abzutun, werdet Ihr dafür mit Blut bezahlen."
languages.original_text: "I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre, was Ihr sagt und mir gefallen Eure Andeutungen nicht. Ich warne Euch, falls Ihr versucht, den Segen des Todlosen als bloßen Psionismus abzutun, werdet Ihr dafür mit Blut bezahlen."

languages.text: « Je vois où vous voulez en venir, et je dois dire que je n'aime pas trop ce que vous insinuez. Je vous préviens : si vous faites ne serait-ce qu'essayer de faire passer la bénédiction de l'Immortel pour du psykerisme infâme, je vous viderai de votre sang. »
languages.original_text: "I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois où vous voulez en venir, et je dois dire que je n'aime pas trop ce que vous insinuez. Je vous préviens : si vous faites ne serait-ce qu'essayer de faire passer la bénédiction de l'Immortel pour du psykerisme infâme, je vous viderai de votre sang. »

languages.original_text: "I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."

languages.text: "Söylediklerini duyuyorum ve imaların hoşuma gitmiyor. Seni uyarıyorum, Ölmeyen'in lütfunu habis bir ruhsezi öğretisi gibi tasvir etmeye çabalarsan bunun hesabını kanla verirsin."
languages.original_text: "I hear what you are saying, and I do not like your insinuations. I warn you, if you attempt to paint the Undying One's blessing as foul psykerism, you will answer for it in blood."
